Arssm's 3 Pack Men Oversized Vintage T Shirts are a pleasure to wear!  These oversized tees are true to size, well constructed, and very comfortable. The stone-washed look is fashionable and the heavy weight fabric with solidly finished seams make them stand out as special. I chose the black/gray/blue combo and am pleased with each of the colors.  I will get more use out of these tees than I would have suspected. They not only look great by themselves but also pair well with many styles of jackets, jeans and pants. And, they can be worn year round.  Given their comfort, fit and versatility, I think they're a great value! Highly recommended!!!

评论概述: Great Quality Tees Perfect For Customizing
评论详情: These tees are pretty nice. It's a great washed effect design, nice feel and weight to the tees as well as a great value. I ordered these simply out of curiosity. I love the washed effect and was curious as to the quality and cut of these tees. The cut is pretty standard. While it's a loose fit, I wouldn't say it's the loosest. It's not an oversized or boxy-fit style which is what I was hoping for, but a nice cut all the same. I will probably modify them, as I find them to be a bit long. All the colors are well done and I've been happy with all of them. I am planning to apply an assortment of materials to each shirt. I will be experimenting with DTF, vinyl and embroidery to see how these shirts hold up to different application methods. I also like that they come unbranded, making it easy to customized the branding details.

I love the vintage vibe of these tees. the oversized fit is incredibly comfortable. The 3-pack option is a fantastic value for money. You get three high-quality shirts in different colors, ensuring you always have a stylish option on hand. They're comfortable, stylish, and versatile a must-have for any wardrobe.

I love the stonewash look of these shirts, since they elevate a basic tee quite a bit.  The black shirt looks especially good.  These are nice and hefty, with a generous collar.  Very loose, comfy fit as well.  These hold up well to washing and drying, and definitely seem like they'll last a long time with how heavyweight the fabric is.  Very stylish basic tee you can reach for anytime.

These oversized tees offer a laid-back vibe perfect for any casual occasion. The loose fit and soft fabric ensures all-day comfort, while the vintage wash adds a touch of style. These shirts come in a convenient pack of three, providing great value for your wardrobe. Whether you're lounging at home or hitting the streets, these streetwear essentials have you covered.

评论概述: Comfortable shirts to hang out in.
评论详情: These men’s oversized vintage loose fit tees are comfortable shirts to hang out in. Great price for 3 tee shirts. I want more in other colors. I recommend.

model is 6'4" 215 pounds wearing a size XL. The best thing about these shirts is the value to get three of them for such a low price. I am particularly fond of how soft and comfortable they are, and they even have a little bit of stretch. the only thing that I would possibly change is the collar is a little bit tight, but it can be loosened by stretching it out. These are great shirts to wear around the house.

评论概述: Winner winner chicken dinner!! These are the mutt's nuts!!
评论详情: Let me first say, I will be buying more! That being said, this is a great find.  I had been wearing No Boundaries oversized Ts, but those have become hard to find.  These are just as good, if not better than those.  I ordered them a size smaller than I normally wear, and they still have that oversized comfortable feeling that I look for in an oversized T.  The colors are great and they are well built so they should last several years.  I highly recommend these as they are also a great value!
They fit as expected. They have this really cool stone washed look! Very soft and no fading after washing! Great Tee Shirts

See I was excited to receive the T-Shirts, but I feel a bit let down. The product description mentions the colors as black, gray, and blue, but the “blue” shirt is actually purple. This was disappointing, as I was expecting a true blue shirt, not something that looked completely different upon arrival.  Additionally, the washed vintage look isn’t consistent across the three shirts. While one shirt had a slight vintage vibe, the others lacked that effect almost entirely. The quality and fit are fine, but the misleading color and inconsistent design make this a less satisfying purchase than I had hoped for.  If you’re very particular about color accuracy and design details, I’d suggest looking elsewhere.

I have a lot of sick t shirts but these are easily my favourite. Thick and oversized they look badass. Insane quality for Amazon shirts. Worth the price. I’ve had mine for about a year and they’re still the same as day 1.
Comfy and nice for the gym
